GlobalGoodsType.title: Software
GlobalGoodsType.description: A free and open-source software tool designed to manage, analyze, or transmit health-related data, with proven utility in multiple settings.

SDGs.title: Good Health and Well-being
SDGs.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

HealthStandards.name: GS1
HealthStandards.description: Global Standards One, an international standard for supply chain management and product identification in healthcare.

HealthStandards.name: Health Level 7
HealthStandards.description: International standards for transfer of clinical and administrative data between software applications

Interoperability.name: Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources
Interoperability.description: A standard describing data formats and elements and an application programming interface for exchanging electronic health records

ProductOverview.Summary: The Project Catalog Management Tool aims to connect product catalogs in order to show a clear journey from manufacturer to patient. It establishes master data that includes GS1 identifiers, global categories, and mappings to local identifiers. This enables end-to-end visibility, allows shipments to flow between systems, and helps supply chains perform.
ProductOverview.Users: Product managers, national regulatory bodies, pharmacy data managers, logistics managers

Reach.SummaryOfReach: PCMT is being used to manage product catalogs at the national level in multiple countries, and in two global organization implementations to coordinate catalog identifiers across member countries.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.  The scores for Inclusive Design, Climate Resilience and Low Carbon are not available as this assessment was done using the previous version of the maturity model.

collectionInitiative.label: Digital Public Goods Alliance
collectionInitiative.description: A multi-stakeholder initiative to accelerate the attainment of the Sustainable Development Goals in low- and middle-income countries by facilitating the discovery, development, use of, and investment in digital public goods.

collectionInitiative.label: DIAL Exchange
collectionInitiative.description: A platform by the Digital Impact Alliance to connect digital public goods and solutions for global development.
